name: openai-apps-sdk-template-pizza
description: A template for building a React application with Vite, Hono, and Cloudflare Workers

scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && vite build && wrangler deploy --dry-run
scripts.build-deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run deploy

WORKER_DOMAIN_BASE.description: The domain of this worker and where the assets will be served. Example: https://openai-apps-sdk-template.example.workers.dev

WIDGET_DOMAIN.description: The widget domain to provide to OpenAI for the sandbox. No subdomains are supported. Example: https://gettoolbase.ai
